Florida Surf Film Festival
Saturday, August 23, 2025
5:00 PM
11:30 PM
News-Journal Center
221 North Beach Street
Daytona Beach, FL, 32114
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
The Florida Surf Film Festival is proud to present its third-quarter event on
Friday, August 23, 2025
, at the
Daytona State News‑Journal Center
. The centerpiece of the evening will be the
East Coast Premiere of
A Marble in the Jar
, an intimate documentary by
Greg Browning
and
Scott Smith
, featuring surfing phenom
Tatiana Weston‑Webb
.
This special screening is dedicated to the memory of
Greg Browning
, who passed away earlier this year. A beloved figure in the surf community, Greg was a celebrated surfer, filmmaker, father, and friend.
A Marble in the Jar
stands as a moving tribute to his storytelling brilliance, deep empathy, and unwavering love for surfing and family.
Greg’s surf career began in the 1990s as a standout member of Taylor Steele’s
Momentum Generation
. He transitioned from professional surfer to a prolific filmmaker, directing and producing numerous iconic surf films and media for Body Glove and beyond. His gift for weaving stunning visuals with heartfelt narrative left a lasting impact on the world of surf cinema.
Joining us to honor his memory are
Scott Smith
, co-director and longtime collaborator, and
Parker Browning
, Greg’s son, who continues his father’s work with integrity and spirit.
Click here to Purchase Tickets

17
Howliday Pet Parade - A December to Remember
Wednesday, December 17, 2025
5:30 PM
7:30 PM
Riverfront Esplanade
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Experience 'A December to Remember' at the Riverfront Esplanade in Downtown Daytona Beach with our fourth annual Howliday Pet Parade! Well behaved pups are welcome! Dress up your pup or showcase a matching outfit with your pup while you walk in the parade! Best Dressed, Most Creative and Judge’s Favorite awards will be given out by our three judges of the parade! Enjoy beautiful waterfront views, walk the holiday light display, and support our local pet vendors! Entry is free but we ask that you bring a cash donation or donation of pet food, supplies, beds, etc for Halifax Humane Society based in Daytona Beach! Requested arrival sign-ins start at 5:30pm with the parade starting at 6pm. Holiday Costume judging will begin at 6pm with awards being given out at 7pm. Registration for this event will open in October 2025.
View Event →

Sunset Concert Series - The Days Between
Saturday, August 9, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Manatee Plaza
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.
View Event →

Thursday, August 7, 2025
5:00 PM
8:30 PM
News-Journal Center
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
A youth movement. Treating people better. Learning life's lessons from unexpected teachers. These are just a few of the topics to be presented at this year’s Elevate Daytona Beach presented by AdventHealth, scheduled for Thursday, August 7, from 5:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. at the News-Journal Center on Beach Street.
News-Journal Center doors will open at 5pm for a social hour with a brand new feature, the Elevate Expo: A Nonprofit Showcase. Theaters doors will open for seating at 6pm. Elevate Daytona Beach will begin promptly at 6:30pm.

Sunset Concert Series - The Cure Tribute
Friday, July 25, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
The sun will be setting as the Friday, July 25 Sunset Concert Series presents
LOVESONG – The Cure Tribute
and
FIRST WAVE
here at the Riverfront Esplanade in collaboration with Al Smith Productions.
LOVESONG
is more than just a tribute band; it is a gateway to an authentic Cure concert. Led by the enigmatic Rusty Wilmot, whose portrayal of Robert Smith is uncanny, Lovesong replicates the band's sound and captivating stage presence. Attendees will experience the meticulously crafted soundscapes and a mesmerizing light and video show, transporting them to the heart of a Cure experience.
CLICK HERE TO PURCHASE TICKETS
Gates open at 5:30 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

Flags for Heroes
Sat, Jun 28, 2025
9:15 AM
Sat, Jul 5, 2025
5:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Veterans Plaza
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join the Rotary Club of Daytona Beach West  in commemorating the bravery and sacrifice of our heroes, past, present, and future, who courageously put their lives on the line each day for the greater good.
This initiative extends recognition to members of our military, first responders, and individuals who have exemplified heroism in your personal life. These esteemed individuals will be publicly honored by name in a dedicated display.
Sponsored flags will be prominently showcased from June 28th to July 5th along the Riverfront Esplanade on North Beach Street in Daytona Beach, FL.
Click here to Sponsor a Flag

Riverfront Esplanade
(map)

ICS
The sun will be setting as the Friday, June 20 Sunset Concert Series presents
Brothers Within
at 7:30 PM in the Riverfront Esplanade across from the Brown & Brown Insurance building at 355 N. Beach Street in Downtown Daytona Beach. The
Sunset Concert Series
is a partnership between Al Smith Productions and the Esplanade dedicated to bringing a new entertainment venue to Downtown Daytona.
Brothers Within
is an
organic reggae band out of
Daytona Beach Shores.
Their message lies within their name, which they spread through their music!
Three tiers of advance tickets are available. Tickets will also be available at the gate.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6:00 PM; show starts at 7:30 PM.
Grab dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

Howliday Pet Parade - A December to Remember
Wednesday, December 17, 2025
5:30 PM
7:30 PM
Riverfront Esplanade
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Experience 'A December to Remember' at the Riverfront Esplanade in Downtown Daytona Beach with our fourth annual Howliday Pet Parade! Well behaved pups are welcome! Dress up your pup or showcase a matching outfit with your pup while you walk in the parade! Best Dressed, Most Creative and Judge’s Favorite awards will be given out by our three judges of the parade! Enjoy beautiful waterfront views, walk the holiday light display, and support our local pet vendors! Entry is free but we ask that you bring a cash donation or donation of pet food, supplies, beds, etc for Halifax Humane Society based in Daytona Beach! Requested arrival sign-ins start at 5:30pm with the parade starting at 6pm. Holiday Costume judging will begin at 6pm with awards being given out at 7pm. Registration for this event will open in October 2025.

9
Sunset Concert Series - The Days Between
Saturday, August 9, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Manatee Plaza
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.

Founded in 2017, the Brown Riverfront Esplanade Foundation, Inc. (BREF) is a 501c(3) nonprofit organization established by J. Hyatt and Cici Brown. BREF’s mission is to restore the riverfront to its previous glory and facilitate the restoration, operation and revitalization of the Riverfront Esplanade.
In 2019, BREF entered into a long term lease with the City of Daytona Beach for the purpose of redeveloping, operating and managing the Riverfront Esplanade, formerly Riverfront Park. The City of Daytona Beach contributes financially to the maintenance and operations of the Riverfront Esplanade.
Inspired by memories of his childhood spent along the riverfront, Chairman Hyatt Brown, along with the BREF Board, is committed to delivering a spectacular space where future generations can go to experience the charm of downtown Daytona Beach.

Howliday Pet Parade - A December to Remember
Wednesday, December 17, 2025
5:30 PM
7:30 PM
Riverfront Esplanade
105 Jackie Robinson Parkway
Daytona Beach, FL, 32114
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Experience 'A December to Remember' at the Riverfront Esplanade in Downtown Daytona Beach with our fourth annual Howliday Pet Parade! Well behaved pups are welcome! Dress up your pup or showcase a matching outfit with your pup while you walk in the parade! Best Dressed, Most Creative and Judge’s Favorite awards will be given out by our three judges of the parade! Enjoy beautiful waterfront views, walk the holiday light display, and support our local pet vendors! Entry is free but we ask that you bring a cash donation or donation of pet food, supplies, beds, etc for Halifax Humane Society based in Daytona Beach! Requested arrival sign-ins start at 5:30pm with the parade starting at 6pm. Holiday Costume judging will begin at 6pm with awards being given out at 7pm. Registration for this event will open in October 2025.

Friday, August 8, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Manatee Plaza
355 North Beach Street
Daytona Beach, FL, 32114
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

Founded in 2017, the Brown Riverfront Esplanade Foundation, Inc. (BREF) is a 501c(3) nonprofit organization established by J. Hyatt and Cici Brown. BREF’s mission is to restore the riverfront to its previous glory and facilitate the restoration, operation and revitalization of the Riverfront Esplanade.
In 2019, BREF entered into a long term lease with the City of Daytona Beach for the purpose of redeveloping, operating and managing the Riverfront Esplanade, formerly Riverfront Park. The City of Daytona Beach contributes financially to the maintenance and operations of the Riverfront Esplanade.
Inspired by memories of his childhood spent along the riverfront, Chairman Hyatt Brown, along with the BREF Board, is committed to delivering a spectacular space where future generations can go to experience the charm of downtown Daytona Beach.

355 North Beach Street

ICS
The sun will be setting as the Friday, June 20 Sunset Concert Series presents
Brothers Within
at 7:30 PM in the Riverfront Esplanade across from the Brown & Brown Insurance building at 355 N. Beach Street in Downtown Daytona Beach. The
Sunset Concert Series
is a partnership between Al Smith Productions and the Esplanade dedicated to bringing a new entertainment venue to Downtown Daytona.
Brothers Within
is an
organic reggae band out of
Daytona Beach Shores.
Their message lies within their name, which they spread through their music!
Three tiers of advance tickets are available. Tickets will also be available at the gate.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6:00 PM; show starts at 7:30 PM.
Grab dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

Google Calendar
ICS
The sun will be setting as the Friday, July 25 Sunset Concert Series presents
LOVESONG – The Cure Tribute
and
FIRST WAVE
here at the Riverfront Esplanade in collaboration with Al Smith Productions.
LOVESONG
is more than just a tribute band; it is a gateway to an authentic Cure concert. Led by the enigmatic Rusty Wilmot, whose portrayal of Robert Smith is uncanny, Lovesong replicates the band's sound and captivating stage presence. Attendees will experience the meticulously crafted soundscapes and a mesmerizing light and video show, transporting them to the heart of a Cure experience.
CLICK HERE TO PURCHASE TICKETS
Gates open at 5:30 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

7:30 PM

ICS
Experience 'A December to Remember' at the Riverfront Esplanade in Downtown Daytona Beach with our fourth annual Howliday Pet Parade! Well behaved pups are welcome! Dress up your pup or showcase a matching outfit with your pup while you walk in the parade! Best Dressed, Most Creative and Judge’s Favorite awards will be given out by our three judges of the parade! Enjoy beautiful waterfront views, walk the holiday light display, and support our local pet vendors! Entry is free but we ask that you bring a cash donation or donation of pet food, supplies, beds, etc for Halifax Humane Society based in Daytona Beach! Requested arrival sign-ins start at 5:30pm with the parade starting at 6pm. Holiday Costume judging will begin at 6pm with awards being given out at 7pm. Registration for this event will open in October 2025.

Sunset Concert Series - The Days Between
Saturday, August 9, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Manatee Plaza
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.

Experience 'A December to Remember' at the Riverfront Esplanade in Downtown Daytona Beach with our fourth annual Howliday Pet Parade! Well behaved pups are welcome! Dress up your pup or showcase a matching outfit with your pup while you walk in the parade! Best Dressed, Most Creative and Judge’s Favorite awards will be given out by our three judges of the parade! ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

7:30 PM

ICS
Experience 'A December to Remember' at the Riverfront Esplanade in Downtown Daytona Beach with our fourth annual Howliday Pet Parade! Well behaved pups are welcome! Dress up your pup or showcase a matching outfit with your pup while you walk in the parade! Best Dressed, Most Creative and Judge’s Favorite awards will be given out by our three judges of the parade! Enjoy beautiful waterfront views, walk the holiday light display, and support our local pet vendors! Entry is free but we ask that you bring a cash donation or donation of pet food, supplies, beds, etc for Halifax Humane Society based in Daytona Beach! Requested arrival sign-ins start at 5:30pm with the parade starting at 6pm. Holiday Costume judging will begin at 6pm with awards being given out at 7pm. Registration for this event will open in October 2025.

Sunset Concert Series - The Days Between
Saturday, August 9, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Manatee Plaza
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

Sunset Concert Series - The Days Between
Saturday, August 9, 2025
7:30 PM
10:00 PM
Riverfront Esplanade - Manatee Plaza
355 North Beach Street
Daytona Beach, FL, 32114
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
It's time to be Grateful!
The sun will be setting on Friday, August 8, and Saturday, August 9, as the Sunset Concert Series presents
The Days Between Weekend Fest
featuring
The Cosmic Jam
on Friday and
The Rap Jacks
on Saturday. The Days Between refers to the 9 days between Jerry Garcia's birthday (August 1) and his death (August 9) and is a term used by Grateful Dead fans to refer to this period of time, particularly as a way to honor and remember Jerry Garcia. It also refers to one of their songs.
The Cosmic Jam
hails from New Smyrna Beach and jams to covers from the Grateful Dead and defines itself as "Where Rock And Jam Band Worlds Collide."
The Rap Jacks
were formed in the heart of Central Florida, in the Orlando area, and have become a local favorite and a powerhouse in the Grateful Dead tribute world.
Click here to purchase tickets!
Gates open at 6 PM – Show Starts at 7:30 PM.
Have dinner at one of the Beach Street restaurants before the show!
NOTE: Ice chests, coolers, and containers are prohibited.

Elevate Daytona
Thursday, August 7, 2025
5:00 PM
8:30 PM
News-Journal Center
221 North Beach Street
Daytona Beach, FL, 32114
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
A youth movement. Treating people better. Learning life's lessons from unexpected teachers. These are just a few of the topics to be presented at this year’s Elevate Daytona Beach presented by AdventHealth, scheduled for Thursday, August 7, from 5:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. at the News-Journal Center on Beach Street.
This year’s star-studded local speaker lineup is listed below with their presentation:
Alexander Anderson -
A Seat at the Table Derrick Collins - The Power of Mentoring
Christen Gandy -
The Fortune of the Finite: A Life Worth Limiting
Dr. Itzel Harriott -
Building Business Resilience
Kaitlin Healy -
The Cart and The Horse: A Business Fable
Kim Kroeger-Bushell -
When the Student Is Ready, the Teacher Will Appear
Krista Oakes -
I Am a Liar
Jacqueline Powell -
Ho'oponopono
Jessica Stipanovic -
The Future is Female and It's at Her Fingertips
Edith Tiencken -
Living in Awe
Donald Toldson, Sr. -
Why Civility Matters
Dr. Camesha Whittaker-Samuel -
What If We Just Treated People Better?
News-Journal Center doors will open at 5pm for a social hour with a brand new feature, the Elevate Expo: A Nonprofit Showcase. Theaters doors will open for seating at 6pm. Elevate Daytona Beach will begin promptly at 6:30pm.
CLICK HERE TO PURCHASE TICKETS
